biography.bio: John Hahn-Petersen was born on November 4, 1930 in Copenhagen, Denmark as John Charles Hahn-Petersen. He was an actor, known for Taxa (1997), You Are Not Alone (1978) and Dyden går amok (1966). He was married to Birgit Hahn-Petersen. He died on January 4, 2006 in Copenhagen.
biography.name: John Hahn-Petersen

biography.bio: Birgitte Federspiel was born on September 6, 1925 in Copenhagen, Denmark. She was an actress, known for Babette's Feast (1987), Hunger (1966) and L'étranger frappe à la porte (1959). She was married to Freddy Koch, Henning Ahrensborg and Jens Østerholm. She died on February 2, 2005 in Odense, Denmark.
biography.name: Birgitte Federspiel

biography.bio: Strøbye was most famous for his comedy roles, as the confused uncle in Min søsters børn (My sisters Children) and the hustler Gyldenkål in Familien Gyldenkål (The Goldcabbage Family). But his biggest role and success was in Matador the TV series a lawyer Skjold Hansen, he started his acting career and education as an actor at Det Kongelige Teater (The Royal Danish theater), he also worked at Folketeatret (The peoples theater). Strøbye made his movie debut in Nåler 1951 and his last role was in 1998, as the aging inspector in the legendary Olsen Banden movies.
biography.name: Axel Strøbye

biography.bio: Caja Heimann was born on December 7, 1918 in Copenhagen, Denmark. She was an actress, known for Passer passer piger (1965), Unfaithful (1966) and Dyden går amok (1966). She was married to Louis Miehe-Renard. She died on August 12, 1988 in Denmark.
biography.name: Caja Heimann

biography.bio: Louis Miehe-Renard was born on April 11, 1919 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He was an actor, known for Adam og Eva (1953), Soldaterkammerater (1958) and Nu stiger den (1966). He was married to Caja Heimann. He died on January 21, 1997 in Denmark.
biography.name: Louis Miehe-Renard

biography.bio: Bodil Steen was born on January 14, 1923 in Copenhagen, Denmark as Bodil Jørri Steen. She was an actress, known for Det hændte i København (1949), The Girl and the Playboy (1965) and I kongens klæ'r (1954). She died on January 10, 1979 in Denmark.
biography.name: Bodil Steen

biography.bio: Katja Miehe-Renard was born on December 6, 1943 in Denmark. She is an actress and producer, known for Buster's World (1984), Once Upon a War (1966) and Aftermath (2004).
biography.name: Katja Miehe-Renard

biography.bio: Hanne Løye was born on November 19, 1932 in Randers, Denmark. She is an actress, known for 3 (1971), The Olsen Gang (1968) and Olsen-bandens flugt - over plankeværket (1981). She was previously married to Palle Skibelund.
biography.name: Hanne Løye

biography.bio: Born in Odense, Denmark on December 9th, 1934, Morten Grunwald is "World famous in Denmark" for several popular film roles. Most famous, however, will always be his Benny in all of the "Olsen Banden" films, where he starred alongside Ove Sprogøe and Poul Bundgaard. He attended Odense Theatrical School in 1958 and graduated from The Royal Theater of Denmark's Theatrical School in 1962. Since 1971, he has been the director of several theatres in Copenhagen: Bristol Teatret (1971-1980), Betty Nansen Teatret (1980-1992), Østre Gasværk (1992-1998).
biography.name: Morten Grunwald

biography.bio: Birgit Sadolin was born on October 10, 1933 in Denmark. She is an actress, known for Tre piger fra Jylland (1957), Een pige og 39 sømænd (1965) and Cop (1976).
biography.name: Birgit Sadolin

biography.bio: Carl Ottosen was born on July 18, 1918 in Denmark. He was an actor and writer, known for Soldaterkammerater på sjov (1962), Journey to the Seventh Planet (1962) and Hunger (1966). He died on January 8, 1972 in Denmark.
biography.name: Carl Ottosen

biography.bio: Lise Thomsen was born on December 26, 1914 in Florida, USA. She was an actress, known for Caresses interdites (1970), Discretion Wanted (1946) and Princesse des Faubourgs (1942). She died on November 26, 2003 in Denmark.
biography.name: Lise Thomsen

biography.bio: Arthur Jensen was born on November 9, 1897 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He was an actor, known for Huset på Christianshavn (1970), The Olsen Gang's Big Score (1972) and The Torndal Cousins (1973). He died on November 28, 1981 in Gentofte, Denmark.
biography.name: Arthur Jensen

biography.bio: Lily Broberg was born on September 19, 1923 in Århus, Denmark. She was an actress and director, known for Matador (1978), Mød mig paa Cassiopeia (1951) and Palle Alone in the World (1949). She died on July 30, 1989 in Denmark.
biography.name: Lily Broberg

biography.bio: Peter Kitter was born on March 1, 1915 in Copenhagen, Denmark as Christian Johan Peter Alfred Petersen. He was an actor, known for Soldaterkammerater på efterårsmanøvre (1961), Dyden går amok (1966) and Vi som går stjernevejen (1956). He died on October 5, 1983 in Denmark.
biography.name: Peter Kitter
